str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
A brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian. A brother near or remote.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To be faint, be weary. From ek and kakos; to be weak, i.e. to fail.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To do well, act honorably, do what is right. From kalos and poieo; to do well, i.e. Live virtuously.
